mapper.select: SELECT shU.shoppingmall_user_id AS shId , shU.shoppingmall_user_pw AS shPw , shU.shoppingmall_user_name AS shUserName , shU.shoppingmall_name AS shName , shL.level_code AS shLevel , shU.shoppingmall_user_address AS shAddr , shU.shoppingmall_user_email AS shEmail , shU.shoppingmall_user_phone AS shPhone , shU.shoppingmall_user_iden_num AS shNum , shU.shoppingmall_user_reg_date AS shReg , shU.shoppingmall_user_account_status AS shStatus , shP.product_code AS shProduct , shU.shoppingmall_bank AS shBank , shU.shoppingmall_bank_number AS shBankNum , shP.product_name AS shProductName FROM tb_shoppingmall_user AS shU INNER JOIN tb_member_level AS shL ON shU.shoppingmall_level_code = shL.level_code INNER JOIN tb_product AS shP ON shU.shoppingmall_product = shP.product_code
